name: En of Love
original_name: รักวุ่นๆของหนุ่มวิศวะ
overview:
Tossara: Gun Tossakan is a very bright and tall freshman medical school student who has been in love with the popular third-year engineering student and head of hazer Bar Sarawat since he was in high school. The world is small and a university is smaller. Being popular students at the same university leads Gun and Bar to bump into each other until Gun manages to woo Bar. Or perhaps Bar also has a confession to make?

Love mechanics: A love story that begins one night in a club, between a senior engineer Mark, who is absolutely drunk and dragging with the painful burden of his one-sided love and Wee with whom he meets and confuses as the object of his affection.

This is Love Story: A love story about how the Neur engineering college resident playboy secretly falls in love with Praram, a high school senior and younger brother of Gun Tossakan, and how he wins over the boy and his brother.
